presentationInfo.title: 3D Prototype
presentationInfo.info: OBEL will provide you with any 3D model you need and will print your project with great precision!

content.title: What we can offer you
content.detail: Being 3 young students inspired by 3D printing, we have the skills to provide you with a 3D model, an engineering drawing and/or a plastic printed part or a complete assembly for your request . At the moment we have the Prusa i3 MK3S+ and we model with Catia and Blender. Of course we provide the models in the preferred format. If you have no preference, we will share it with you in .stl format.

presentationInfo.title: Submit a request
presentationInfo.info: Submit your project and OBEL will respond as soon as possible! Fees and waiting time will be provided once we have responded.
